title: Cold Burn
description: Brian Hatcher wants it all - control of the motorcycle club his father runs, the murderer of his best friend David six feet under, and, more than anything, David's sister Lisa.He wants Lisa on the back of his bike, in his home, in his bed, and under the spell of his cold burn.Â But, with Lisa unsure of the role the Iron Tornadoes played in her brother's death and her long-held goal of becoming a criminal prosecutor, what Brian wants may be nothing like what Brian gets.
author: Olivia Rigal
